name: プロ野球スーパーリーグ'91
summary: Sports Talk Baseball, released in Japan as Pro Yakyuu Super League '91, is a Mega Drive/Genesis baseball video game which features an official MLBPA license as well as most rules and aspects followed by Major League Baseball.
info:
• 中文名: 棒球
  • 开发: SEGA
  • 发行: SEGA
  • 别名: プロ野球スーパーリーグ'９１
  • 别名: Sports Talk Baseball
  • 别名: MLBPA Sports Talk Baseball
  • 平台: MD
  • 游戏类型: Sports
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 2人
  • 发行日期: 1991年8月30日
